law.full_text:
SUBSEQUENT DEFICIENCIES.
If, subsequent to July 31, 2009, the Director of Finance issues a billing, deficiency determination or assessment based upon a statement or return filed pursuant to Section 21.12.5 of this article, penalties shall be imposed only with respect to the difference between the amount paid and the correct amount of tax. This section shall not invalidate any waiver granted under Section 21.12.3 of this article.
law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
SUBSEQUENT DEFICIENCIES. (§ 21.12.6)
SUBSEQUENT DEFICIENCIES. If, subsequent to July 31, 2009, the Director of Finance issues a billing, deficiency determination or assessment based upon a statement or return filed pursuant to Section 21.12.5 of this article, penalties shall be imposed only with respect to the difference between the amount paid and the correct amount of tax. This section shall not invalidate any waiver granted under Section 21.12.3 of this article.
law.html:
SUBSEQUENT DEFICIENCIES.

If, subsequent to July 31, 2009, the Director of Finance issues a billing, deficiency determination or assessment based upon a statement or return filed pursuant to Section 21.12.5 of this article, penalties shall be imposed only with respect to the difference between the amount paid and the correct amount of tax.  This section shall not invalidate any waiver granted under Section 21.12.3 of this article.

This section shall not invalidate any waiver granted under Section 21.12.3 of this article.
